verbs.description: Congressman Jim Bridenstine [V: was] sworn in Monday as the new head of NASA Space by Vice President Mike Pence after one of the more contentious confirmation processes in the Trump era .

[ARG1: Congressman Jim Bridenstine] was [V: sworn] in [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARG2: as the new head of NASA Space] [ARG0: by Vice President Mike Pence] [ARGM-TMP: after one of the more contentious confirmation processes in the Trump era] .
